meanings.definition: The state or quality of not being unique.
meanings.sent1: The nonuniquenesses of the snowflakes made each one special in its own way.
meanings.sent2: The nonuniquenesses of the fingerprints made it difficult to identify the culprit.
meanings.sent3: The nonuniquenesses of the identical twins always confused their friends.
meanings.sent4: The nonuniquenesses of the stars in the sky reminded her of how vast the universe is.
meanings.sent5: The nonuniquenesses of the seashells on the beach fascinated the young girl.

meanings.definition: The presence of multiple solutions or possibilities.
meanings.sent1: The nonuniquenesses of the math problem allowed for different correct answers.
meanings.sent2: The nonuniquenesses of the puzzle made it challenging yet fun to solve.
meanings.sent3: The nonuniquenesses of the treasure map led to unexpected adventures.
meanings.sent4: The nonuniquenesses of the jigsaw pieces made it hard to complete the picture.
meanings.sent5: The nonuniquenesses of the menu options gave everyone a variety of choices.
